Interface IEnquiryController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantEnquiryController, HDBManagerEnquiryController, OfficerEnquiryController
public interface IEnquiryController
Generic interface for EnquiryController defining common methods for enquiry operations This interface follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by allowing views to depend on this abstraction rather than concrete implementations.

    • getEnquiryById

      Enquiry getEnquiryById(String enquiryId)
      Gets an enquiry by ID
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The enquiry, or null if not found

    • getEnquiriesForProject

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesForProject(String projectName)
      Gets all enquiries for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      List of enquiries for the project

    • getPendingEnquiriesForProject

      List<Enquiry> getPendingEnquiriesForProject(String projectName)
      Gets pending enquiries for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      List of pending enquiries for the project

    • addReply

      boolean addReply(String enquiryId, User respondent, String content)
      Adds a reply to an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry
      respondent - The user responding to the enquiry
      content - The content of the reply
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • getEnquiryCount

      int getEnquiryCount(String projectName)
      Gets the count of enquiries for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The number of enquiries

    • getPendingEnquiryCount

      int getPendingEnquiryCount(String projectName)
      Gets the count of pending enquiries for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The number of pending enquiries
